Html:
I had several critical errors come to my inbox on Saturday. Does anyone know what could be going on?

"The current type, Kigg.Web.ISocialServiceRedirector, is an interface and cannot be constructed. Are you missing a type mapping?"

What do you mean?
Does this happen suddenly on Saturday?

I will check first my web.config file
It happened on Saturday with about 10 emails with the same message. That is the only time it occurred.
